registerForm.title: Register a Freelancr account
registerForm.registerInfo: Welcome to Freelancr, to create an account you first need a GitHub user that will work as the site's username. All labels marked with (*) are required.
registerForm.weberror1: The link is required to be at least 4 characters long
registerForm.weberror2: The link you entered is invalid

success.message: Thank you for creating an account with Freelancr. Please check your email for confirmation.

notificactions.under15: You have to be older than 15 to create an account.
notificactions.invaliddate: The date you entered is invalid.
